attributes.action: Allow persons over the age of sixteen, who are not in full-time education, to claim the job seekers' allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sixteen- and seventeen-year-olds have added challenges to searching for work because they have little or no work experience, but face paying the same expenses as those over eighteen: rent, food, and transportation.
Additionally, the minimum age to receive the job seekers' allowance age should be lowered to sixteen, so that sixteen- and seventeen-year-old job seekers, legally eligible to work and not in full-time education, are able to receive the same aggressive job search assistance afforded to those eighteen and over.
